wikipedia_page.main: Paul Bloomfield (February 1946 – April 2016) was a British property investor known as "Boom-boom" Bloomfield.

response: *L.P.Hartley and Anthony Powell (1962) with Paul Bloomfield, British Council, Writers and Their Work #144, revised 1971 as Bergonzi on Powell
In April 2014, a London court ordered British property investor Paul Bloomfield, who was an associate of Ghadami and has since died, to pay Ghadami £110m in damages.
